channel.title: Any Idea How to fix This Java Problem?
channel.description:
the java script (the window that comes up with Moparscape) says this after a few minutes of play:
Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1400) at client.method146(client.java:11914) at client.method102(client.java:7747) at client.method9(client.java:8620) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4450) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
And ten it freezes. Any1 no if i can fix this, and if i can then how?
ty

item.title: Any Idea How to fix This Java Problem?
item.dc:creator: @hotdude0 hotdude0
item.description:
@hotdude0 wrote:

tyvm< but does any! no directly wats the problem and how i can fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Any Idea How to fix This Java Problem?
item.dc:creator: @deathlee deathlee
item.description:
@deathlee wrote:

you’re looking at your free space in properties on Local Disc(C:)
and refresh java you have to refresh iteither that or go to java.com.
when u spawn a monster you need to put in it’s (hit points) or else it’ll freeze becuase it has zero life and u can’t attak it
and il give u an pickup for party hats

<u type ::pickup 1038 for red party hat,::pickup 1040 for yellow party hat,::pickup 1044 for green party hat,::pickup 1046 for purple party hat, and ::pickup 1048 for white party hat.

                                                                    your friend, Deathlee

Read full topic

item.title: Any Idea How to fix This Java Problem?
item.dc:creator: @deathlee deathlee
item.description:
@deathlee wrote:

do u have the latest java? if u don’t dowload it.
u don’t have the right requirements for the game
u might need to reload java or chek your memry on your computer
u just need to go to my computer and right click on local dick(C:) and look at properties

                                                                     your friend, Deathlee

                 p.s do u know a site that can help me with the pickups and npc's?

thank you
